column4: News;Preah Sihanouk:------ Heavy rainfall has caused the coastal city of Sihanoukville to flood in some areas
column5: especially in Sangkat 4 municipality.------The rain water began from about 2 am on September 13
column6: 2018 until 10 am. The rain has now subsided.------Market vendors in Sihanoukville said that they had a large amount of merchandise damaged
column8: because of flood water entered the market. Homes have also been affected.------According to the source
column10: the rainfall was not abnormal for the season
column11: but the city has never flooded like this.------Recently
column12: there are Chinese companies and some big people who have filled in lakes and canals. Citizens have also criticized local authorities as being corrupt by allowing these groups to do so freely.------Sihanoukville City Hall officials said the city / province authority had taken care of and is continuing to restore the canals. Some are also affected by  people who have built their houses on the canal. This issue will be handled in due course.------ ------ ------http://www.rasmeinews.com/%E2%80%8B%E1%9E%8F%E1%9F%86%E1%9E%94%E1%9E%93%E1%9F%8B%E2%80%8B%E1%9E%98%E1%9E%BD%E1%9E%99%E1%9E%85%E1%9F%86%E1%9E%93%E1%9E%BD%E1%9E%93%E2%80%8B%E1%9E%80%E1%9F%92%E1%9E%93%E1%9E%BB%E1%9E%84%E2%80%8B/
